results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = A019565(A003714(e)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
program: A072649(n) = { my(m); if(n<1, 0, m=0; until(fibonacci(m)>n, m++); m-2); }; \\ From A072649
A019565(n) = {my(j,v); factorback(Mat(vector(if(n, #n=vecextract(binary(n), "-1..1")), j, [prime(j), n[j]])~))}; \\ From A019565
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 30 2018
